What is the name of the enzyme usually a: The coagulation of milk (by proteolysis or acidification) is the key operation in cheesemaking. The enzymatic (rennet-induced) coagulation of milk can be divided into two phases: (1) hydrolysis of the micelle-stabilizing protein, κ-casein, (2) aggregation and gelation of the rennet-altered micelles, with the development of a particulate gel.
Where in London were the first escalator: The London Underground had to wait a little longer for its first escalator; this came to Earls Court in October 1911, courtesy of the Otis Elevator Company, which by now was doing a roaring trade.
